mapper.sql: id, khid, create_account, create_time, update_account, update_time, member_id, order_num, adslaccount, orderstatus, amount, product_amount, ship_amount, title, weight, quantity, paytype, is_paid, pay_fee, payment_num, payment_time, linkman, contractmobile, distributddress, installaddress, owner, ownermobi, idcard, origin, packageID, packageName, firstMonthFeeType, invoice, invoiceprice, commision, predeposit, member_remark, remark, finishtime, settlestatus, netusername, netcardid, netimg1, netimg2, netimg3
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from ord_order
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.sql: o.finishtime,o.order_num,o.create_time,p.product_name as productName,o.paytype,o.amount,o.commision,(o.amount-o.commision) AS balamount,(CASE o.settlestatus WHEN '0' THEN '待结算' WHEN '1' THEN '已结算' END) AS settlestatus
mapper.select:
select
distinct
FROM ord_order o LEFT JOIN ord_order_item od ON(o.order_num=od.order_id) LEFT JOIN pro_product_info p ON(od.product_id=p.id)
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ord_order (id, khid, create_account, create_time, update_account, update_time, member_id, order_num, adslaccount, orderstatus, amount, product_amount, ship_amount, title, weight, quantity, paytype, is_paid, pay_fee, payment_num, payment_time, linkman, contractmobile, distributddress, installaddress, owner, ownermobi, idcard, origin, packageID, packageName, firstMonthFeeType, invoice, invoiceprice, commision, predeposit, member_remark, remark, finishtime, settlestatus, netusername, netcardid, netimg1, netimg2, netimg3 ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{khid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adslaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{productAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shipAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paytype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isPaid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{payFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{paymentNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractmobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{distributddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{installaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownermobi,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packageid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{packagename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstmonthfeetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{commision,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{predeposit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{memberRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{settlestatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netcardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netimg1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netimg2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netimg3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update ord_order
khid = #{khid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_account = #{createAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_account = #{updateAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
adslaccount = #{adslaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orderstatus = #{orderstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
product_amount = #{productAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ship_amount = #{shipAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
paytype = #{paytype,jdbcType=CHAR},
is_paid = #{isPaid,jdbcType=CHAR},
pay_fee = #{payFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
payment_num = #{paymentNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payment_time = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
linkman = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contractmobile = #{contractmobile,jdbcType=CHAR},
distributddress = #{distributddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
installaddress = #{installaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ownermobi = #{ownermobi,jdbcType=CHAR},
idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
origin = #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
packageID = #{packageid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
packageName = #{packagename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
firstMonthFeeType = #{firstmonthfeetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invoice = #{invoice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invoiceprice = #{invoiceprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
commision = #{commision,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
predeposit = #{predeposit,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
member_remark = #{memberRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
finishtime = #{finishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
settlestatus = #{settlestatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
netusername = #{netusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
netcardid = #{netcardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
netimg1 = #{netimg1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
netimg2 = #{netimg2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
netimg3 = #{netimg3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ord_order set khid = #{khid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_account = #{createAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_account = #{updateAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adslaccount = #{adslaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderstatus = #{orderstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, product_amount = #{productAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ship_amount = #{shipAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, paytype = #{paytype,jdbcType=CHAR}, is_paid = #{isPaid,jdbcType=CHAR}, pay_fee = #{payFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, payment_num = #{paymentNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_time = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, linkman = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contractmobile = #{contractmobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, distributddress = #{distributddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, installaddress = #{installaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ownermobi = #{ownermobi,jdbcType=CHAR}, idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, origin = #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, packageID = #{packageid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, packageName = #{packagename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, firstMonthFeeType = #{firstmonthfeetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice = #{invoice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoiceprice = #{invoiceprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, commision = #{commision,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, predeposit = #{predeposit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, member_remark = #{memberRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finishtime = #{finishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, settlestatus = #{settlestatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, netusername = #{netusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, netcardid = #{netcardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, netimg1 = #{netimg1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, netimg2 = #{netimg2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, netimg3 = #{netimg3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: o.id,o.order_num,o.khid,o.create_time,p.product_name as productName,od.price,od.quantity,o.linkman,o.contractmobile,(CASE o.paytype WHEN '21' THEN '连连支付' WHEN '22' THEN '支付宝支付' WHEN '23' THEN '货到付款' END) AS paytype,o.amount,(CASE o.orderstatus WHEN '02' THEN '已取消' WHEN '03' THEN '待付款' WHEN '04' THEN '待办理' WHEN '05' THEN '办理成功' WHEN '06' THEN '待退款' WHEN '07' THEN '退款结束' WHEN '08' THEN '办理失败' END ) AS orderstatus,o.update_account,o.update_time,o.is_paid,o.remark,od.newmob as newmob,od.oldmob as oldmob,o.invoice,o.netusername,o.netcardid,o.netimg1,o.netimg2,o.netimg3,od.cardprice,od.firstfee,od.issales,o.packageName,o.distributddress,o.owner,o.ownermobi,o.installaddress,o.idcard
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from ord_order where create_time BETWEEN CURDATE()-INTERVAL 1 DAY AND CURDATE() GROUP BY khid
